source_text: Royalty on any mineral or metallic product recovered from the Mining area (other than graphite)
additional_details: This royalty is a term of the acquisition agreements (SPA 1 and SPA 2) for the Reynolds Range Project, where iTech Minerals acquired the project from Prodigy Gold NL. The royalty is likely payable by iTech Minerals (the acquirer) to Prodigy Gold NL (the seller).
